author: jleroux
msg: Adds 2 new lookup fields in the FormWidgetExampleForms.xml file.
Changes the way the explanation are displayed, now using tooltips for an easier reading
Changes all explanation tooltips style to button-text for a better legibility

author: jleroux
msg: "Applied fix from trunk for revision: 1369555" (fixed a tree conflict by hand)
Closes "correct "javascript:void();" to "javascript:void(0);" to make it syntax valid" reported by Leon https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4970
Firefox will throw syntax error if you call javascript void function without parameter.
jleroux: I did not reproduce with FF14 on XP (modern browsers correct by themselves) but I agree it's a better syntax. So I changed all where it was needed.
